column1: Kata Robata////one of my FAVORITE sushi places in the greater houston area.  the happy hour menu is great!  they have $4 rolls (i.e. california
column2: spicy tuna etc).  not your typical rolls since the fish is extremely fresh.  we also had the foie gras scallop
column4: and the tuna tar tar.  They are the greatest dishes i've ever tried anywhere.  the foie gras is such a great concept that you won't regret trying and the tuna tar tar is perfect since it comes with lotus chips that are characteristic only to kata.  love it!!
